meanings.definition: Relating to the soft part of the roof of the mouth behind the hard palate.
meanings.sent1: The velar area of the mouth is important for certain speech sounds.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined the velar region during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The velar section of the mouth whispered secrets to the dentist.
meanings.sent4: Her velar smile revealed her joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The velar part of the mouth felt smooth and delicate.

meanings.definition: A speech sound produced with the back of the tongue against or near the soft palate.
meanings.sent1: The pronunciation of the 'ng' sound involves a velar position.
meanings.sent2: He struggled with the velar sound in the new language.
meanings.sent3: The velar sound in the word 'king' made the child giggle.
meanings.sent4: His velar articulation resonated through the room.
meanings.sent5: The velar sound echoed softly in the quiet classroom.
